turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you please get me a small cold brew iced coffee? No add-ins, just black.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where should I get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there's a shop off of NW 13th street in Gainesville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh okay. I thought there was a closer one on 6th street. Want to do that one so I can drop off the brochures to the commissioner's office right next door?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I guess that is probably better. Good thought!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks haha

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As long as you're going to the commissioner's office with those brochures, could you also pick up the documents they were going to fax?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are those the ones for the partnership or the new program plans?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh. Well, both, I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How much coffee have you had today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Obviously not enough. Peet's is the best though so that should fix the problem. While you're at it, get yourself something on me. Today is going to be a long one haha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It sure will be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you remember to grab the program for Dr. Simmon's program?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's the purple one, isn't it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All of them are purple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You right. You need to fix that shit.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add it to the list!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Before or after I get the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uh, probably, like, now. Or this conversation never happened.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's the pre-coffee versus post-coffee difference!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Amen.
